EmailTemplate.name: PO Acknowledgement email no SOA sent out
EmailTemplate.subject: So No_SOA__PO Name_Dealer Name_SAD
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Greetings!
Thank you for choosing SunPower.
This order has been entered in the system. The order confirmation (SOA) and schedule of delivery date will be given to you as soon as we have confirmation of material availability from our Supply Team.
We appreciate your patience. Thank you.
Sincerely,
Partner Support Representative UK
Website: www.sunpowercorp.com
E-Mail: orderuk@sunpowercorp.com
Tollfree Number: 00-800-SUNPOWER (786-76937)
